org.monitis.monitor.jboss7

Class JBoss7Monitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • IGenericCustomMonitor
      • org.monitis.monitor.jboss7.JBoss7Monitor

  • public class JBoss7Monitor
extends IGenericCustomMonitor
    This class implements a custom monitor for JBoss7 monitoring with Monitis. The monitor uses JBoss7 JSON/HTTP management interface to collect statistics and the Monitis Open API to upload them to Monitis
    Author:
    Drago Z Kamenov

        public java.util.List<MonResult> get_results()
